trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event to provide custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>事件，以便提供自定义排序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>未设置属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs once for each pair of cells in the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 为每个对中正在排序的列的单元格一次发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload.
trans-unit.target: 仅当用户单击与列的标头时，才发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>，或当调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName>重载。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs for a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 当发生此事件时对具有的列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件在一个列或多个列中使用的单元值的行进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>属性中指定的列中的单元格值进行比较<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> properties to access values in other columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A>属性，以访问通过其他列中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The column to sort.
trans-unit.target: 要排序的列。

trans-unit.source: The value of the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the first cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含第一个单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含第二个单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 获取要比较的第一个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常与结合使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the first cell.
trans-unit.target: 第一个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 获取要比较的第二个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常与结合使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the second cell.
trans-unit.target: 第二个单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在排序的列。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful in determining and controlling sort behavior in programmatic sorts.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可确定和控制中以编程方式排序的排序行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> to sort.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref>进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row containing the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含要比较的第一个单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 对基于多个列中的单元值的行进行排序时，此属性很有用。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含第二个单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row containing the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含要比较的第二个单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 对基于多个列中的单元值的行进行排序时，此属性很有用。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含第二个单元格的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the order in which the compared cells will be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值将排序比较单元格的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Setting this value is typically the last operation you will perform in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 设置此值通常是将执行的处理程序中的最后一个操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You will typically set this value to the return value of a comparison method such as <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 你通常将通过以下方式设置此值为<xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>之类的比较方法的返回值

trans-unit.source: Less than zero if the first cell will be sorted before the second cell; zero if the first cell and second cell have equivalent values; greater than zero if the second cell will be sorted before the first cell.
trans-unit.target: 小于零，如果第一个单元格将排序的第二个单元格; 之前第一个单元格和第二个单元格具有等效值; 如果为零大于零，如果第二个单元格将之前的第一个单元进行排序。
